name: Stand My Heroes
storyline:
An independent investigative agency that gathers diverse human resources from all over Japan, commonly known as "Stand".
The first mission given to you, who was assigned as a temporary member...
It was a scout for the "stand" members.

You who are busy with the scouting work of the boyfriend who is not straightforward,
In the end, he becomes involved in a big mystery.
The meaning of scouting, the unresolved case of fate...
The truth that you will reach, and what is justice?
summary:
Stand My Heroes is a mobile game developed by Coly and released on iOS and Android on September 5, 2016. The game is a puzzle combined with otome game style.

An anime television series adaptation aired from October 2019 to December 2019. An original video animation was released in May 2023.
